channel.title: Phone Girlfriend Vacation Sprint Phones on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Girlfriend Vacation Sprint Phones on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: anger
item.description: So today I got up.. got right to work. did a little bit of financial planning.. played with bank statements and suddenly noticed a very large charge from sprintpcs. so I called them and they suck. really. they suck so so much. they alleged that I received two phones, started a new service contract and then canceled. thus invoking about $600 of charges. So I talked to them and they have a different “story” on what happened and refuse to refund 400 of the 600.
